website.name: Pouranik
website.purpose: A React-based platform to explore, read, and discuss books while joining like-minded communities.

/.description: The homepage introduces Pouranik, highlights features, and shows trending books or recommendations.

/book/:id.description: Displays detailed information about a specific book including title, author, genre, description, ratings, and availability.

/genres.description: Lists all book genres like Fiction, Romance, Science, Fantasy, etc., with number of books available in each.

/explore.description: Discover new books, trending titles, and curated recommendations.

/about.description: Provides background information about Pouranik, its mission, and the community vision.

/library.description: A personalized space where users can save their books, track progress, and manage their reading collection.

/timerpage.description: A Pomodoro-style timer that helps readers build consistent reading habits and track focus time.

/analytics.description: Shows reading statistics such as number of books read, genres explored, and time spent reading.

/signup.description: User authentication page to register a new account or log into an existing one.

/book/:id/reviews.description: Displays community reviews, ratings, and discussions for a particular book.

/community.description: Central hub for book lovers to join discussions, share recommendations, and connect with other readers.

/club.description: Lists various book clubs (Fantasy, Romance, Sci-Fi, Classics) where members read and discuss selected titles.

features.name: Smart Search
features.description: Search millions of books using Google Books API.

features.name: Personal Library
features.description: Save your favorite books, organize your shelf, and track progress.

features.name: Community Book Clubs
features.description: Join book clubs and participate in live discussions.

features.name: Reading Timer
features.description: Stay focused using an in-app reading timer for productivity.

features.name: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: View insights into your reading habits and growth.
